column1: albert j. paul| albert j. paul. born: october 16
column3: 2015. local florists send gifts on june 12
column4: 2015 albert husband of glennis paul and the late lois paul. father of joe paul and his wife kay and arthur paul sr. grandfather of joe paul jr.
column8: trista paul. he is also survived by 7 great grandchildren and 3 great great grandchildren. the family will receive friends at the connelly funeral home of dundalk
column9: 7110 sollers point rd. on tuesday 2-4 & 6-8 pm. a funeral service will be held on wednesday ai 11 am. interment at gardens of faith cemetery. send sympathy card
